TextLibrary.Text: Didn't your own God, Sartek, do similar things? The stories say that he changed creatures...
Didn't your own God, Sartek, do similar things? The stories say that he changed creatures...
Didn't your own God, Sartek, do similar things? The stories say that he changed creatures...
Didn't your own God, Sartek, do similar things? The stories say that he changed creatures...

The Arboleth only highlight the difference between Sartek and Lord Bane. Sartek created the Minotaurs, the Gnolls, the Griffons and the Pegasi. All of these creatures are wild but beautiful. Bane can only create violent, ugly things.

True. But I think you must have met different Gnolls than I have if you think they're beautiful...
